titleStmt.title: Two letters of advice I. For the susception of Holy Orders, II. For studies theological, especially such as are rational : at the end of the former is inserted a catalogue of the Christian writers, and genuine works that are extant of the first three centuries.
titleStmt.author: Dodwell, Henry, 1641-1711.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Benjamin Tooke ..., and are to be sold by Joseph Wilde,

notesStmt.note: "A catalogue of the writings of such Christian authors ...": p. 135-159.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
